document_data.name: Hidden House
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hidden House''' was a subterranean temple dedicated to [[Leira]] located beneath the city of [[Westgate]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Location: The temple was located in the northwest section of the city beneath the intersection of [[Wagonwheel Ride]] and [[Westgate Market Street]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The temple was run by High Mistmistress [[Halautha Immerstar]]. Halautha was assisted by 6 other priests and 4 followers.
